name: Appavior Media Corporation
overview:
To unlock value through Behavioral Intelligence based personalized Merchandising. Developer of unique technology Discovery - Merchandising - Analytics

We are growing and building our business …here are a few snippets

>> We are focused on understanding BehAvior using Apps as the basis – AppAvior if you will >> We are leveraging our understanding of Behavior to do other neat things – helping our partners Merchandise is one of them >> We are literally creating the world largest database – 100000+ Apps & Merchandise that consumers spend most time on >> We are passionate about privacy – we do not track a shred of info about identity; be it a person or device >> We are all about Discovery! We are thrilled to help consumers Discover relevant Merchandise and Apps
